name: Earth Day VR
description: A game where you are trying to clean the trash off a small earth model. Little do you know that you are a child that cares about the world around you. I did NOT make the low poly earth model and got off the unity asset store from Ryan Zehm. Important: The right controller ray only works with buttons but the left only works for picking up trash. This was only tested on oculus. I am not sure if it works for wmr, valve index, or htc.
